type: TS LF Trading Bot Error - Initial Targets Node Missing

definition.text: An Initial Targets node was expected but not found at the node where the error originated.

paragraphs.text: The Trading Session may run without the Open Stage, Manage Stage, and Close Stage nodes present. But if a stage exists, then the required nodes within must be properly defined.
Add the missing node and try again. The session will not run free of errors until all required nodes are defined.
